meanings.definition: A cyclic compound containing one or more double bonds.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the properties of the cycloolefin in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Cycloolefins are commonly used in the production of plastics.
meanings.sent3: The cycloolefin walked into the chemistry class and everyone stared.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a cycloolefin, weaving through different ideas effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the cycloolefin under the microscope amazed the students.

meanings.definition: A type of compound with a ring structure and unsaturated carbon-carbon bonds.
meanings.sent1: The cycloolefin's unique structure makes it useful in organic chemistry.
meanings.sent2: Many pharmaceuticals contain cycloolefins as key components.
meanings.sent3: The cycloolefin at the party was the center of attention with its interesting shape.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a cycloolefin, connecting thoughts in unexpected ways.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the cycloolefin filled the room, creating a pleasant atmosphere.
